PrecisAuthority to enter into an AMENDING AGREEMENT with the Province of NEW BRUNSWICK and the FARM CREDIT CORPORATION for the 1994 NEW BRUNSWICK DEBT REFINANCING PROGRAM, in order to extend by six months the period that the principal repayment would be due.
